woman.description: The PUMA Softride Sway is the more boldly stylised cousin to the other women-specific, comfort-forward trainers in the Softride line. The Sway has an exaggerated midsole and layered upper design that's full of colour and futuristic style. You'll never be more comfortable standing out in a crowd.
woman.story: The PUMA Softride Sway is the more boldly stylised cousin to the other women-specific, comfort-forward trainers in the Softride line. The Sway has an exaggerated midsole and layered upper design that's full of colour and futuristic style. You'll never be more comfortable standing out in a crowd.
details: The upper of the shoes is made with at least 20% recycled materials
SOFTRIDE: Soft foam designed for all-day cushioning and comfort
SOFTFOAM+: Step-in comfort sockliner designed to provide soft cushioning thanks to its extra thick heel
info: Moulded fine TPU cage for stability

woman.description: Get road ready in the Retaliate 2 Running shoes. Lightweight and ergonomic, with a burrito collar construction for a foot-hugging fit, a comfortable, supportive midsole, rubber zoning for enhanced outsole traction, bold PUMA branding and a pull tab for easy on-and-off, you’ll have full command of whatever surface you’re training on.
woman.story: Get road ready in the Retaliate 2 Running shoes. Lightweight and ergonomic, with a burrito collar construction for a foot-hugging fit, a comfortable, supportive midsole, rubber zoning for enhanced outsole traction, bold PUMA branding and a pull tab for easy on-and-off, you’ll have full command of whatever surface you’re training on.
details: CMEVA: PUMA's compression-moulded EVA material for lightweight performance
SoftFoam: PUMA's dual-density insole provides two unique layers of cushioning for customised comfort, fit and long-lasting durability
info: Zoned rubber outsole for enhanced traction
Lace closure for a snug fit

woman.description: You've put in the work, now kick the training up a notch with next-level gear in the Disperse XT 3 training shoes, the latest update to a line-up at the nexus of performance and design. This reimagining of the versions that came before features zoned rubber-traction for additional control and the same super lightweight materials for maximum agility. Train better and bolder with more eye-catching design elements.
woman.story: You've put in the work, now kick the training up a notch with next-level gear in the Disperse XT 3 training shoes, the latest update to a line-up at the nexus of performance and design. This reimagining of the versions that came before features zoned rubber-traction for additional control and the same super lightweight materials for maximum agility. Train better and bolder with more eye-catching design elements.
details: The upper of this shoe is made with at least 20% recycled materials as a step toward a better future.
SoftFoam+: PUMA's comfort sockliner for instant step-in and long-lasting comfort that provides soft cushioning every step of your day
info: Zoned rubber outsole for improved traction
Lining: 100% Textile; Outsole: 52.47% Synthetic, 47.53% Rubber; Upper: 66.88% Textile, 33.12% Synthetic; Sockliner: 100% Textile; Midsole: 100% Synthetic

woman.art: Puma Cali Court Leather Womens Sneakers
woman.description: Meet the PUMA Cali Court, your new favorite court classic. Standing at the intersection of sport, fashion, and streetwear, this sneaker brings the tennis vibes to any outfit and can be easily mixed and matched with other pieces to create an effortless look. This version features a full leather upper and fits in court side.
woman.story: Meet the PUMA Cali Court, your new favorite court classic. Standing at the intersection of sport, fashion, and streetwear, this sneaker brings the tennis vibes to any outfit and can be easily mixed and matched with other pieces to create an effortless look. This version features a full leather upper and fits in court side.
details: Tumbled leather vamp, heel overlay and eyestay overlay
Leather quarter panel, tongue and formstrip
Perforated vamp and quarter panel details

woman.description: Road Rider is the newest addition to the Rider family. It takes cues from Puma's archive of running sneakers from the 1970s, and features a retro upper that sits atop a sculpted comfortable EVA midsole. This upper feature a nylon base with a mix of suede and synthetic overlays.
woman.story: Road Rider is the newest addition to the Rider family. It takes cues from Puma's archive of running sneakers from the 1970s, and features a retro upper that sits atop a sculpted comfortable EVA midsole. This upper feature a nylon base with a mix of suede and synthetic overlays.
details: Suede tongue label with engraved and printed PUMA branding
Lycra lining and insole with screen-printed PUMA branding

woman.description: Elevate your street style with the Puma Mayze Lth Wn's platform sneakers. These trendy platform trainers from Puma offer a bold and stylish look that will turn heads wherever you go. With a sleek leather upper and a chunky platform sole, these sneakers provide both fashion and comfort. Step up your shoe game with the Puma Mayze Lth Wn's and make a statement with every stride.
woman.story: Elevate your street style with the Puma Mayze Lth Wn's platform sneakers. These trendy platform trainers from Puma offer a bold and stylish look that will turn heads wherever you go. With a sleek leather upper and a chunky platform sole, these sneakers provide both fashion and comfort. Step up your shoe game with the Puma Mayze Lth Wn's and make a statement with every stride.
details: Leather upper with suede and synthetic overlays
Elevated rubber midsole with textured tooling
Lace closure for a snug fit
Foil-printed PUMA No.2 Logo at quarter
PUMA Formstrip at medial and lateral sides
Foil-printed PUMA Cat Logo at heel

woman.description: The special seamless construction on these shorts is designed to minimise friction so you can feel your best – for fashion that moves with you.
woman.story: The special seamless construction on these shorts is designed to minimise friction so you can feel your best – for fashion that moves with you.
details: Ribbed waistband with repeated PUMA wordmark and contrast piping
PUMA Cat Logo repeated along the leg

woman.description: The PUMA SQUAD leggings from PUMA embody the perfect combination of performance and ultimate comfort. Designed for dynamic women who stop at nothing, these leggings are more than just fitness clothing: they're a statement of your confidence and determination.
woman.story: The PUMA SQUAD leggings from PUMA embody the perfect combination of performance and ultimate comfort. Designed for dynamic women who stop at nothing, these leggings are more than just fitness clothing: they're a statement of your confidence and determination.

PUMA Cat logo on the leg
Placed Graphic Rubber High Density Printing Suit

woman.description: Stand out from the crowd in a crop top that truly pops. Featuring a seamless shiny knit construction designed to minimise friction and enhance freedom of movement, this is fashion that moves with you. With subtle recurring branding, the big cat has its paws all over this one, too.

woman.description: We've taken our Classics and updated it for HER. Carefully designed, these leggings elegantly hug your curves while providing optimal support thanks to their flattering high waist. With its form-fitting design and thoughtful details, it's ideal for sports days where style meets performance. The high waist offers a secure fit, while the all-way stretch fabric ensures maximum freedom of movement.
woman.story: We've taken our Classics and updated it for HER. Carefully designed, these leggings elegantly hug your curves while providing optimal support thanks to their flattering high waist. With its form-fitting design and thoughtful details, it's ideal for sports days where style meets performance. The high waist offers a secure fit, while the all-way stretch fabric ensures maximum freedom of movement.
details: Decorative piping for a unique design
PUMA Cat logo on left leg

woman.description: Keep your style simple with the latest high-top version of our Kaia sneakers. They have a cushioned lining for all-day comfort and a small platform for extra elevation. The classic monochrome colour scheme makes them a versatile addition to any wardrobe.
woman.story: Keep your style simple with the latest high-top version of our Kaia sneakers. They have a cushioned lining for all-day comfort and a small platform for extra elevation. The classic monochrome colour scheme makes them a versatile addition to any wardrobe.

woman.description: Dream of lazy days and West Coast vibes in this new edition of the Cali. A chunky tooled sole pairs with a genuine leather upper for a stylish look and a premium feel – all based around our timeless OG design.
woman.story: Dream of lazy days and West Coast vibes in this new edition of the Cali. A chunky tooled sole pairs with a genuine leather upper for a stylish look and a premium feel – all based around our timeless OG design.

woman.description: The RS-X is back. The future-retro silhouette of this sneaker returns with a progressive aesthetic and angular details, complete with nubuck and suede overlays. The combo’s all about a disruptive design to showcase your disruptive style.
woman.story: The RS-X is back. The future-retro silhouette of this sneaker returns with a progressive aesthetic and angular details, complete with nubuck and suede overlays. The combo’s all about a disruptive design to showcase your disruptive style.

PUMA Formstrip on lateral and medial sides

woman.description: Find your optimal flow and unwind when you're done in these women's shorts. The shorts are treated with moisture-wicking properties to keep you dry, whether you're in the studio or outdoors.
woman.story: Find your optimal flow and unwind when you're done in these women's shorts. The shorts are treated with moisture-wicking properties to keep you dry, whether you're in the studio or outdoors.red and white, this is your new daily uniform.

woman.description: We've added a dose of edge to our traditional athletic silhouettes in our PUMA POWER collection. Unleash your full power in this sweatshirt, which has our standard, athletic fit, French terry material, and some cool colourblocked details with a PUMA graphic. Rep that casual and sporty look.

man.description: For trendsetters seeking effortless style, the RAD/CAL Tee is a must-have essential. Crafted for maximum comfort and an athletic fit, this lightweight cotton tee lets you showcase your casual cool wherever the day takes you.

man.description: Equip yourself for everyday excellence in our Essentials+ collection, a line of cutting-edge street style must-haves upgraded with the latest on-trend accents and athletic technology. Our Essentials+ Tape Hoodie treads the line between simplicity and style with a classic cut and minimalist branding.

Our Essentials+ Tape Hoodie treads the line between simplicity and style with a classic cut and minimalist branding.
details: Jersey-lined hood with elastic drawcord for an adjustable fit
PUMA No. 1 Logo rubber print at chest
Woven tape with repeated PUMA Wordmark and PUMA Cat Logo on sleeve

man.description: Our EVOSTRIPE cutline is all about human performance and freedom of movement. These slim-fit sweatpants have the EVOSTRIPE on the outseam for improved articulation and maximum flexibility with less friction and tugging.
man.story: Our EVOSTRIPE cutline is all about human performance and freedom of movement. These slim-fit sweatpants have the EVOSTRIPE on the outseam for improved articulation and maximum flexibility with less friction and tugging.

man.description: Our CA Pro takes inspiration from the original California we released back in the ‘80s. It has a look that’s both classic and modern, featuring a perforated toe – just like the OG – statement panelling, and the famous PUMA Formstrip. This pair has an raised collar, sitting just above the ankle to add a sporting edge.
man.story: Our CA Pro takes inspiration from the original California we released back in the ‘80s. It has a look that’s both classic and modern, featuring a perforated toe – just like the OG – statement panelling, and the famous PUMA Formstrip. This pair has an raised collar, sitting just above the ankle to add a sporting edge.
details: PUMA Formstrip on the medial and lateral side
PUMA Cat Logo on the heel

man.description: Let everyone know: there's a new KING in town. This football boot lives up to its name with the combination of non-animal-based K-BETTER™ upper material and GripControl 3D structure on the medial side for enhanced ball control and a touch that's fit for a KING. This version is part of the new Tricks Pack featuring statement-making different coloured boots.
man.story: Let everyone know: there's a new KING in town. This football boot lives up to its name with the combination of non-animal-based K-BETTER™ upper material and GripControl 3D structure on the medial side for enhanced ball control and a touch that's fit for a KING. This version is part of the new Tricks Pack featuring statement-making different coloured boots.
details: Lightweight removable sockliner with NanoGrip technology keeps the foot from slipping inside the boot
OrthoLite® memory foam padding in the heel for improved comfort
Lightweight outsole with external heel counter, integrated stability spine, and conical studs for maximum manoeuvrability
Knitted, low-cut slip-on construction ensures a comfortable fit

man.description: Show up to the pitch looking, and playing, like Egypt’s star player with these replica shorts. They’re made from sweat-wicking material, to keep you cool in the tensest moments of the game, and finished with the team’s famous crest on the leg.

man.description: Gear up in old-school Ghana cool. Inspired by iconic moments from national team history, this 2022 Ghana Home jersey features a repositioned Black Star at the center and sleeve cuffs in the colours of the national flag.

man.description: PUMA has been defining sports since 1948, and this PUMA Team graphic tee is a retro-inspired gem that proudly shows that heritage. This regular-fit men's tee features the PUMA logo on the left sleeve and a fun rubber graphic print on the chest and back.

Reflective No.1 Logo on left sleeve

man.description: Simple and streamlined, the Capri Royale sneakers feature a canvas upper with suede detailing and a breathable mesh liner. The two-tone colour scheme makes them versatile and easy to wear with a range of casual outfits.

man.description: We've added a dose of edge to our traditional athletic silhouettes in our PUMA POWER collection. Unleash your full power in this hoodie, which has our standard, athletic fit, French terry material, and some cool colourblocked details.
man.story: We've added a dose of edge to our traditional athletic silhouettes in our PUMA POWER collection. Unleash your full power in this hoodie, which has our standard, athletic fit, French terry material, and some cool colourblocked details.

man.description: Exotek NITRO™ is an architectural solution to tooling construction, it protects and stabilizes a soft EVA foam infused with NITRO™. The structural ‘cage’ allows for a super soft, squishy inner midsole material. As the foam compresses, the cage provides the outer structure and stability needed whilst giving the wearer all the benefits of enhanced comfort.​ This silhouette draws parallels from both architecture and nature. The exposed structures of brutalist architecture, the rib cage of a human body protecting vital organs. This pack features a mesh base with a printed gradient effect and synthetic overlays.
man.story: Exotek NITRO™ is an architectural solution to tooling construction, it protects and stabilizes a soft EVA foam infused with NITRO™. The structural ‘cage’ allows for a super soft, squishy inner midsole material. As the foam compresses, the cage provides the outer structure and stability needed whilst giving the wearer all the benefits of enhanced comfort.​ This silhouette draws parallels from both architecture and nature. The exposed structures of brutalist architecture, the rib cage of a human body protecting vital organs. This pack features a mesh base with a printed gradient effect and synthetic overlays.
details: Mesh base with printed gradient effect
Raised areas on the toe and eyelets
Hot cut details on the eyelets
PUMA Cat logo printed on the heel
Mesh tongue with textile covering and nylon webbing
PUMA logo printed on tongue strap

man.art: PUMA x PERKS AND MINI Tee
man.description: For the final season of PUMA x PERKS AND MINI, we’re back to the PAM/PUMA BIO/VERSE to explore creativity, nature, and change-making. The collection draws inspiration from the past three drops and features bold logos and beautiful artwork that takes you seamlessly from the natural world to the digital world – and into colliding worlds of sport, activity, and play. The tee has a relaxed fit and wild graphics on the front and back. It's perfect for your BIO/VERSE.
